attributes.action: OPPOSE A PEERAGE FOR THE SPEAKER, MICHAEL MARTIN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the people oppose the bestowing of the honour of a peerage on the Speaker of the House of Commons, Michael Martin, on the grounds that 1) he does not deserve it for his dismal performance as Speaker; and 2) he is not an honourable man.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Queen.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
